relevant_findings.general: Elderly female laying in bed comfortable but in pain with movement.
relevant_findings.HEENT: NCAT, PERRL, EOMI, anicteric, dry mucous membranes.
relevant_findings.respiratory: Diminished breath sounds at bases, no wheezes.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Obese, non-distended, markedly tender lower abdomen bilaterally, prominent tenderness over LLQ with mild rebound, hypoactive bowel sounds.
relevant_findings.back: Tender to palpation over lumbar region, spinally and paraspinally. No lesions or masses noted.
relevant_findings.rectal: Normal rectal tone, guaiac normal, deferred secondary to pain.
relevant_findings.extremities: No cyanosis, clubbing, or edema, 2+ symmetric pedal pulses.
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert and oriented x 3, cranial nerves grossly intact, strength intact throughout, intact sensation, no saddle paresthesia.
